description.value:
Trigger A living creature approaches within 10 feet of the smiling face in the center of the north wall

Effect The whistling rises in volume to a painful pitch and deals [[/r (1d8+4)[sonic]]] damage. The affected creature must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:20|traits:damaging-effect] save, and the haunt then rolls initiative.

Critical Success The target takes no damage.

Success The creature takes half damage.

Failure The creature takes full damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Deafened]{Deafened} for 1 minute.

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage, is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Frightened]{Frightened 1}, and is deafened for 2 minutes.

details.description: A cheerful, wordless tune fills the room, compelling everyone to get to work.
details.disable: @Check[type:religion|dc:20|name:Exorcise Spirits|traits:complex,haunt] (trained) to exorcise the spirits, or @Check[type:intimidation|dc:21|name:Take a Break|traits:complex,haunt] to convince the spirits it is time to take a break; three total successes are required to disable the haunt.
details.reset: The ghostly workers cease their routine 2 rounds after all living creatures leave the room and reset after 6 hours.
details.routine: (3 actions) Ghostly workers appear in the room and begin abrading, scrubbing, and splashing cleaning chemicals on anyone in the area. Each creature in the room takes [[/r {1d4+2}[slashing]]]{1d4+2 slashing} and [[/r {1d4+2}[acid]]]{1d4+2 acid damage} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:20|basic:true|name:Avoid Workers|traits:haunt,complex] save; roll once for both).

source.value: Pathfinder Society Intro #2: United in Purpose
